lead_paragraph: Kosuke Hagino won the men's Olympic 400 meters individual medley, and the first swimming gold medal of the Rio Games, on a stellar night for Japan on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Swimming: Hagino Triumphant on Stellar Night for Japan
headline.main: Swimming: Hagino Triumphant on Stellar Night for Japan
